title: Dashboard Landing Page Loads Successfully with Real-Time Data
description: Verify that the dashboard landing page loads correctly and displays a real-time updated overview of project progress including phases and task statuses without manual refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the dashboard landing page
Verify that the overall project progress and phase statuses are displayed correctly
Verify that data updates in real-time without manual page refresh

title: Task Status Update Reflects Across All Views Immediately
description: Check that when a user updates a task status (Pending, In Progress, Done), the change persists to the database and is instantly reflected in Gantt Chart, Kanban Board, Workflow Dashboard, and Activity Logs.

steps.description: Navigate to a specific task in Kanban Board
Update the task status to 'In Progress'
Verify that the updated status is saved in the backend database
Verify that task status updates are reflected instantly in Kanban Board, Gantt Chart Pro, Workflow Dashboard, and Activity Logs

title: Gantt Chart Pro Zoom Functionality
description: Test the zoom feature of the Gantt Chart Pro, verifying zoom levels from 50% to 300%, ensuring proper scaling of tasks and dependency arrows with no UI distortion.

steps.description: Navigate to the Gantt Chart Pro view
Change zoom level progressively from 50% to 300%
Verify that the chart scales appropriately and all tasks and dependency arrows remain visible and correctly aligned

title: Drag-and-Drop Task Reordering in Kanban Board
description: Ensure tasks can be dragged and dropped between columns to update status, and that blocker counts dynamically update accordingly and changes persist to backend.

steps.description: Open the Kanban Board view
Drag a task from 'Pending' column to 'In Progress' column
Verify task status is updated in the UI and backend
Verify blocker counts update dynamically after drag and drop

title: Task Dependency Visualization in Master Map
description: Verify that the Master Map displays all tasks as nodes with correct dependency edges, dynamically updates with changes, and visually indicates blockers and predecessors accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the Master Map view
Verify all tasks are displayed as nodes with dependency arrows connecting them
Verify blockers and predecessors are correctly highlighted or indicated visually

title: Drag-and-Drop and Resize Functionality in Gantt Chart Pro
description: Ensure tasks can be dragged to change dates and resized to adjust durations in the Gantt Chart Pro, and that these updates persist to the backend and update dependent tasks visually.

steps.description: Navigate to the Gantt Chart Pro
Drag a task to a new start date
Verify the new task dates are saved in the backend
Resize a task to change its duration
Verify the updated duration is saved and dependency arrows are updated accordingly

title: Activity Logs Capture All Task Updates in Real-Time
description: Validate the Activity Logs feed shows all task changes including status updates, notes additions, blocker assignments, and that entries appear immediately after the action.

steps.description: Perform task status update or add a blocker on any task
Verify an entry representing the change appears instantly in the Activity Logs feed

title: Setup Wizard Successfully Guides New User
description: Verify that the setup wizard runs through all onboarding steps, enabling new users to configure project phases and tasks, and saves initial project data correctly.

steps.description: Access the Setup Wizard as a new user
Go through each step completing required fields and configurations
Verify that the wizard completes successfully and initial data is saved to backend
Verify the user is redirected to the main dashboard after completion

title: Responsive UI Renders Correctly on Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile
description: Test the platform UI on various device screen sizes to confirm the interface adapts correctly, all features remain accessible, and no layout breakage occurs.

steps.description: Access the platform with desktop screen size
Verify all UI elements are displayed correctly and functional
Resize or access the platform with tablet screen size
Verify layout adapts appropriately without loss of usability
Resize or access the platform with mobile screen size
Verify the mobile UI is usable, navigation accessible, and content readable

title: Task Detail Modal Shows Full Task Information and Dependencies
description: Ensure the Task Detail Modal displays comprehensive information including status, priority, description, notes, and dynamically calculated predecessors and blockers.

steps.description: Open a task detail modal from any task view
Check that all task details including status, priority, description, and notes are displayed
Verify listed dependencies (predecessors) and blockers (successors) are accurate and reflect current task state

title: GAP Dashboard Identifies Next Executable Tasks Correctly
description: Confirm that the GAP Dashboard highlights tasks that have zero blocking dependencies, and updates this list dynamically as blockers are resolved or added.

steps.description: Navigate to the GAP Dashboard view
Verify tasks listed have no blocking dependencies (blocker count = 0)
Add a blocker to an executable task
Verify the task is removed from the list dynamically

title: API Integration with Supabase MCP for Data Operations
description: Verify that all Supabase backend operations including reading, updating, and subscribing to task and phase data tables work without errors during platform use.

steps.description: Perform CRUD operations on tasks and phases through the UI
Verify that operations succeed without errors and data is consistent in Supabase backend
Observe real-time data subscription features for updates from other clients
Verify live sync updates are delivered without lag or data loss

title: Founder Guide Accessibility and Content Verification
description: Check that the Founder Guide is accessible from the dashboard and displays comprehensive guidance content relevant to founders managing the project.

steps.description: Navigate to the Founder Guide section
Verify that guide content is visible, well-formatted, and easy to read
Verify navigation links or sections within the guide function correctly

title: Error Handling When Supabase Connection is Lost
description: Simulate loss of connectivity to the Supabase backend and verify that the UI shows appropriate error messages, prevents data loss, and attempts reconnection where applicable.

steps.description: Disconnect network or simulate Supabase service unavailability
Attempt to update a task status or add a note
Verify that a clear error notification is displayed to the user
Verify that data integrity is maintained and that changes are either queued or safely blocked

title: Performance Testing with Large Numbers of Tasks and Dependencies
description: Load the platform with a large dataset of tasks and complex dependencies and ensure no significant UI lag or backend errors occur, especially in Master Map, Gantt Chart Pro, and Kanban Board.

steps.description: Import or seed a dataset with hundreds of tasks and complex dependencies
Monitor platform responsiveness and UI rendering times across multiple views
Verify no failures or errors occur during interaction and real-time sync

title: Blocker Count Accuracy in Kanban and Workflow Dashboard
description: Verify that the blocker count displayed on tasks in the Kanban Board and Workflow Dashboard accurately reflects the number of active blocking dependencies.

steps.description: Open Kanban Board and Workflow Dashboard views
Check blocker counts for several tasks and cross-verify with dependency data
Add and remove blockers on tasks
Verify blocker counts update immediately to reflect changes

title: Timeline View Displays Tasks and Milestones Chronologically
description: Ensure that tasks and milestones are plotted along a chronological timeline with correct dates, that zoom and navigation controls function properly.

steps.description: Open the Timeline View
Verify tasks and milestones are presented with correct chronological ordering
Use timeline navigation controls (zoom, pan)
Verify controls work smoothly without distortion or data loss
